original_text: But with whom was he grieved forty years? was it not with them that had sinned, whose carcases fell in the wilderness?
korean_text: 또 하나님이 사십 년 동안 누구에게 노하셨느냐 그들의 시체가 광야에 엎드러진 범죄한 자들에게가 아니냐

sentences.original_text: But with whom was he grieved forty years?
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그가 사십 년 동안 누구를 노하셨는가?

sentences.original_text: was it not with them that had sinned
whose carcases fell in the wilderness?
